meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, Conference Room 6ES, and by Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Call to Order
agenda_items.description: Opening of the meeting by the chair.

agenda_items.title: Roll Call
agenda_items.description: Attendance check by the Community Development Coordinator.

agenda_items.title: Community Development Division Reports
agenda_items.description: Reports including updates regarding proposed committee meetings, agenda items, presentations, and updates for the Consolidated Plan.

agenda_items.title: Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: General greetings and acknowledgements to staff, commission members and other members of the public.

agenda_items.title: Vice Chair’s Report
agenda_items.description: General acknowledgements to staff, commission members and members of the public.

agenda_items.title: Announcement
agenda_items.description: Expressions of thanks, congratulations, or condolence; information about holiday schedules; honorary or salutary recognition.
